definition: Wang Jiarui (1949-), PRC politician and diplomat, from 2006 head of CCP central committee's external affairs department 對外聯絡部|对外联络部[dui4 wai4 lian2 luo4 bu4]
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
surname Wang
to rule/to reign over

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
lucky/auspicious/propitious/rayl (acoustical unit)

sentences.english: She also held talks with Head of the International Department of the CPC Central Committee Wang Jiarui.
sentences.chinese: 她還與中共中央對外聯絡部部長王家瑞舉行了會談。

sentences.english: Minister of the International Department of the Central Committee of the CPC Wang Jiarui attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 中聯部部長王家瑞等參加了會見。

sentences.english: Wang Jiarui, Minister of the International Department of the CPC Central Committee (IDCPC), and other officials attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 中聯部部長王家瑞等參加了會見。

sentences.english: But his nuclear negotiator returned with Mr Wang to the Chinese capital.
sentences.chinese: 但他的核問題談判代表隨王家瑞一同返回北京。
